text:
Hey Dave, Ivanti SC on prem is my use. Decent product, but our needs have
expanded after 3 yrs. I'm currently doing a POC with Tanium. They are looking
very promising.

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] If not Ivanti, what?
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from banthonyj77@gmail.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Hey Dave, Ivanti SC on prem is my use. Decent product, but our needs have
expanded after 3 yrs.  I'm currently doing a POC with Tanium. They are looking
